title: DeWitt police investigating body found in East Syracuse
content:
Officers say the body was found by Alden Avenue and Thompson Road by joggers 

Updated 09/27 2015 05:03PM 

Officers say the body was found by joggers on a trail who called 911./Copyright 2015 Nexstar Broadcasting, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. 

DeWitt Police is currently investigating a dead body found at approximately 12 p.m. Sunday. 

Officers say the body was found by Alden Avenue and Thompson Road by joggers on a trail who called 911. 

Captain John Anton tells NewsChannel 9 the body may be burnt or severely decomposed and that they are waiting for a medical examiner to come and investigate the suspicious death. 

Police are unable to tell if the person is a man or woman because of the state of the body. 

NewsChannel 9 will continue to post updates as they become available.
